summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via Style B-specific CSS variable overrides in `frontend/src/index.css` (light/dark) and Style B-only gradient/opacity tuning in `frontend/src/components/marketing/MarketingBanner.tsx`. No evidence of forbidden edits under `frontend/src/components/ui` or backend logic changes in the provided diff summary. Two non-requested metadata/documentation files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded repository metadata or documentation summaries unrelated to the Style B color-tone adjustment.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is styling-only and specifically targets `frontend/src/index.css` and optionally `frontend/src/components/marketing/MarketingBanner.tsx`; changes to project tracking/summary files were not requested.
